Translations.Text: DI PREN covenant EL those RICEV scripture VI PROKLAM GXI POPOL NENIAM conceal gxi, ILI disregarded GXI their DORS meti gxi FOR cheap PREZ. Ki miserable komerc
Those who fanfaron their works wish lauxd io ili really ne done ne opini ili evade retribution. Ili incurred painful retribution
Al DI aparten sovereignty de heavens ter! DI est Omnipotent
En creation de heavens ter alternation nokt tag tie est sign those posed intelligence
Ili memor DI while bud sid their flank ili reflect creation heavens ter Our Lord Vi ne kre all this en vain Vi glor. Sav us el retribution Infer
Our Lord whomever Vi commit al Infer est des unu Vi forsaken Such transgressors ne hav helpers
Our Lord ni auxd caller vok al faith proklam â€˜Vi kred en your Lord ' ni kred! Our Lord forgive us our transgressions remit our pek mort righteous believers
Our Lord dusx us blessings vi promes us Your messengers ne forsake us Tag Resurrection! Vi neniam romp promes
